comments:
On the creation of a brand new project, I added SWT library from the project
classpath and checked the JFace support checkbox, and when I hit finish it threw
a NPE and didnt add the SWT library to the classpath.
Needs to be fixed for 1.1 M1.

The problem is that JFace support requires osgi.jar from the OSGI plugin.
However in 3.1 they removed that JAR and put all its classes in core.jar - hence
adding that to the list of JARs necessary for JFace.
Releasing class SWTContainer.
